x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Retrieves the specific product package details.

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: Get-Operation
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Returns the list of supported REST operations.

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: Get-ActionPlan
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Gets the list of action plans

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: Remove-ProductDeployment
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Invokes remove action on the product deployment

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: Get-ActionPlanOperation
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Gets the specified action plan operation

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: Get-ProductPackage
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Returns an array of product packages.

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: Get-FileContainer
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Retrieves the specific file container details.

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: Get-ProductSecret
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Returns an array of product secrets.

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: Get-ProductSecret
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Retrieves the specific product secret details.

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: Deploy-ProductDeployment
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Invokes deploy action on the product

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: Boot-ProductDeploymentStrap
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Invokes bootstrap action on the product deployment

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: Rotate-ProductDeploymentSecret
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Invokes rotate secrets action on the product deployment

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: Get-FileContainer
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Returns an array of file containers.

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: New-PasswordObject
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: The password as a secure string.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: ExpiresAfter
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The expiration period of the secret.

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: New-FileContainerParametersObject
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Parameters for creating a new file container.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: PostCopyAction
x-ps-parameter-info.description: Specifies the file post copy action.

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: New-SecretParametersObject
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Parameters required for creating/updating a product secret.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: SecretValue
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The secret value in a secure string format.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: Duration
x-ps-parameter-info.description: Duration in TimeSpan format(Define which ISO format)

x-ps-parameter-info.name: ProductDeploymentId
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The identifier of product deployment; null if this version is not installed.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: FileContainerId
x-ps-parameter-info.description: File container resource identifier containing product manifest.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: IsUpdatable
x-ps-parameter-info.description: Value indicating whether the package is applicable for update.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: IsDeployable
x-ps-parameter-info.description: Value indicating whether the package is applicable for deployment.

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: New-SymmetricKeyObject
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: The symmetric key as a secure string.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: Parameters
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The deployment parameters in JToken format

x-ps-parameter-info.name: BlobContainerName
x-ps-parameter-info.description: Blob container name storing the deployment data

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: New-ResourceObject
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Object model of azure resource manager base.

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: New-PfxPasswordObject
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: The pfx certificate file password as a secure string.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: FileContainerId
x-ps-parameter-info.description: File container resource identifier containing product manifest.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: Uri
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The file or container Uri. This is read-only property; a user cannot set it.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: SourceUri
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The remote file location. This is write-only property, DRP never returns it back to a user.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: PostCopyAction
x-ps-parameter-info.description: Specifies the file post copy action.

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: New-DisplayObject
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Contains the localized display information for this particular operation or action.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: Provider
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The localized, friendly version of the resource provider name. The provider name is expected to include the name of the publisher or company responsible. The provider name format should use title case and begin with "Microsoft" for first-party services. For example, the provider name may be"Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute."

x-ps-parameter-info.name: Description
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The localized, friendly description for the operation. The description will be displayed to the user. It should be thorough and concise for used in both tooltips and detailed views.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: Resource
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The localized, friendly version of the resource type related to this action or operation; the resource type should match the public documentation for the resource provider.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: Operation
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The localized, friendly name for the operation. Use the name as it will displayed to the user.

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: New-PostCopyActionObject
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: Specifies the file post copy action.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: NextLink
x-ps-parameter-info.description: URI to the next page of operations.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: Name
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object. This name should match the name that appears in RBAC or the event service.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: Display
x-ps-parameter-info.description: Contains the localized display information for this particular operation or action.

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: New-FileContainerIdObject
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: File container resource identifier containing product manifest.

x-ps-cmdlet-infos.name: New-SecretValueObject
x-ps-cmdlet-infos.description: The secret value in a secure string format.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: BlobContainerName
x-ps-parameter-info.description: Blob container name storing the deployment data

x-ps-parameter-info.name: Parameters
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The deployment parameters in JToken format

x-ps-parameter-info.name: Outputs
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The action plan operation outputs in JToken format

x-ps-parameter-info.name: FileContainerParameters
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The parameters required to create a new file container.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: ResourceGroup
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The resource group the resource is located under.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: SubscriptionId
x-ps-parameter-info.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: SecretParameters
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The parameters required for creating/updating a product secret.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: SecretValue
x-ps-parameter-info.description: The secret value in a secure string format.

x-ps-parameter-info.name: OperationId
x-ps-parameter-info.description: Identifier of the action plan operation.
